channel.name: Salesforce Sales Suite Upgrade for Airbnb

messages.text:
Hi Sophia,

Thanks again for your time last week. I’ve attached the formal proposal for
the Sales Suite Upgrade. It includes the AI enhancement bundle and reflects
the 8% discount we discussed.

Let me know if you’d like to go over any specifics.

Best,

Bruce

Hi Sophia,

Just wanted to check if your team had a chance to review the proposal.
We’re flexible on start dates if that helps align internally.

Cheers,

Bruce

Hey Bruce,

Just got some initial feedback. They’re mostly aligned — only question was
whether implementation support is included in the first month.

– Sophia

Yes — full onboarding and implementation support are included for the first
30 days at no extra cost. I’ll highlight that in a revised version.

Also happy to get on Slack if that’s easier for your side.

Best,

Bruce

That helps a lot, thank you. Feel free to send the updated doc. And yes —
let's move this to Slack, it’s faster for us at this point. I’ve sent you a
dm on slack.

Got the invite — thank you. Uploading the revised version now. Looking
forward to wrapping this up smoothly.

Talk soon,

Bruce

summary: Bruce followed up on a proposal sent to Sophia. Sophia's team had one question about implementation support, which Bruce confirmed was included and offered to move the conversation to Slack. They agreed to continue the discussion on Slack and Bruce is sending over the revised document.
